description: Enjoy a pleasant cycle or walk around Bathpool Park in Kidsgrove, Staffordshire.  Follow the tracks/paths around the  main lake, the peaceful woodland and several ponds. The park also contains a mountain bike track and exercise points. Bathpool is located just south of Kidsgrove town centre and north of Stoke on Trent and Newcastle Under Lyme . Just to the east of Stoke there's some nice trails around Park Hall Country Park . The former quarry site is now notable as Stoke on Trent's only National Nature Reserve comprising woodland, heathland and ponds.
